entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Arm64/Sve: AV in GatherLoad* APIs #103606
  • Should the generic math interfaces be updated with `allows ref struct`? #103605
    9.0.0
  • RuntimeMethodHandle.FromIntPtr and RuntimeFieldHandle.FromIntPtr Allocates GC Memory #103601
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'cond == test->AsOp()->gtOp1' during 'Update flow graph early pass' #103600
  • Incorrect general long time pattern for some cultures on Android #103592
  • Update versioning scheme for Microsoft.DotNet.Cecil #103589
    9.0.0
  • System.IO.Pipelines.Tests.PipeWriterTests.CompleteWithLargeWriteThrows fails in CI #103586
  • Failing test due to no detected IO events in 'System.IO.Tests.FileSystemWatcherTest.ExecuteAndVerifyEvents' #103584
  • Process memory exhaustion under region-based GC heap mode #103582
  • Should we Dispose DefaultAssemblyResolver in SpaceAnalyzer #103581
  • Add in-place sorting methods to OrderedDictionary #103579
    9.0.0
  • [jitstress] JIT\Regression\JitBlue\Runtime_90423 fails with "Assertion failed '(op2 == idx) || (op2->gtEffectiveVal() == idx)' during 'Find oper order'" #103577
    9.0.0
  • Running "sudo -s" via System.Diagnostics.Process on Linux results in its standard input "hijacking" the program #103571
  • Native Crash occurs when using Generics Types #103569
    9.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Tests.Vector3Tests.Vector3LerpTest1 on arm64 #103568
  • [wasm] WBT tests which use SkiaSharp needs to be updated when they contain native libs built against newer emscripten #103566
    Future
  • CecilPackageVersionMatchesAssemblyVersion failing #103563
  • [HTTP/3] Support on WinHttpHandler #103561
    Future
  • AdvSimd: Invalid "The constant does not fit within the value bounds of '0' to '15'" warning #103556
  • Microsoft.Extensions.HostFactoryResolver project is not building #103553
    9.0.0
  • Produce Single File: app crashing #103552
  • Test failure: System.Formats.Nrbf.Tests.AttackTests.ArraysOfStringsAreNotBeingPreAllocated #103550
  • Test failure: System.IO.Tests.File_Delete_Tests.FileSystemWatcher_File_Delete_InNestedDirectory #103549
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.UseWindowsServiceTests.CanCreateService #103548
  • Test failure: baseservices/RuntimeConfiguration/TestConfigTester/TestConfigTester.dll #103547
  • Test failure: System.Numerics.Tests.Vector3Tests.Vector3MultiplyOperatorTest #103544
    9.0.0

Closed

  • NoWorkload-NoWebcil-ST-Wasm.Build.Tests.WorkItemExecution #103114
  • IPNetwork.Contains for IPv4 networks should match IPv4-Mapped IPv6 Addresses #98427
    9.0.0
  • .NET 9.0 Preview 3 crashes SkiaSharp 3.0 in Release mode (possible ICU / Globalization problem) #101107
  • IL2008: System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo: Could not resolve type 'System.SR'. #102303
  • runtime-libraries stress-* build definitions are failing in release/6.0 #100944
    9.0.0
  • Is the implementation(s) of double-checked locking in XmlElement correct? #103602
  • [API Proposal]: Add multipart/related to `MediaTypeNames.Multipart` #95446
    9.0.0
  • Not all built assemblies have deterministic source paths #99594
    9.0.0
  • StaticIndexRangePartition uses volatiles suggesting multiple threading, but uses volatileVar++ #103596
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_65690/GitHub_65690/GitHub_65690.cmd #103545
  • [API Proposal] Create ReadOnlySpanMarshaller<T, TUnmanaged>.ManagedToUnmanagedOut marshaller #101136
    9.0.0
  • Returning a ReadOnlySpan<byte> from a LibraryImport fails #96525
    9.0.0
  • Avoid unnecessary extra indirection in allocation helpers #99661
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Vector.Create #94384
    9.0.0
  • Validate ILLink support for ref structs within generics #98519
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json emits uncompilable code #103515
    9.0.0
  • Port System.Diagnostics documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88567
    9.0.0
  • [android][apple] BinaryFormatter serialization and deserialization not supported on mobile targets #103406
  • If a program is terminated by unhandled exception, its OS process remains #102568
    9.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpMetricsTest_Http11_Async_HttpMessageInvoker Test failure #96407
    9.0.0
  • [Analyzer Proposal]: Remove redundant cast on vectors #103557
  • Unoptimal hash code combine in TypeHashingAlgorithms.ComputeMethodHashCode #103070
  • BinaryFormatterTests.ValidateAgainstBlobs test failure #103530
  • [API Proposal]: Add RuntimeHelpers.GetUserDefinedOperatorMethods for trimming-safe access to user-defined operators #97709
    Future
  • Blazor WASM, cannot run or debug after enabling WasmEnableThreads. #103499
  • x64 test failure: DeserializeStoredObjects strings differ. #103367
  • BinaryFormatTests.FormatterTests.BinaryFormatterTests.ValidateAgainstBlobs test failure on CI #103478
  • Possible mach port leak on MacOS when running multiple tasks over a long time #103507

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix DAC getting alloc context for thread #103610
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Enable nullable for HostFactoryResolver.Tests #103609
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • JIT: Test old block layout in outerloop pipelines #103608
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create portable box helper and wrap the thread-local alloc context in a struct #103607
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Use `allows ref struct` in comparer interfaces #103604
    area-System.Collections, 9.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging] Remove the OCSP nonce #103603
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • Bump braces from 3.0.2 to 3.0.3 in /src/mono/sample/wasm/browser-webpack #103599
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution, javascript
  • Arm64: Shuffle(v, [2, 3, 0, 1]) -> ext_64 v,v,1 #103598
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [8.0] Disable for August the OOB packages enabled in July #103597
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Move downlevel tests to outerloop #103595
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Default DynamicCodeSupport to true for CoreCLR #103594
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Dispose DbCommand in DbMetaDataFactory.ExecuteCommand #103593
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Avoid concatenating adjacent regex loops+strings under right-to-left #103591
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix 103544 and 103556 #103590
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64/SVE: Implemented `RoundAwayFromZero`, `RoundToNearest`, `RouteToNegativeInfininty`, `RoundToPositiveInfinity`, `RoundToZero` #103588
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Dispose some XmlReader and XmlNodeReader in System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #103587
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Bump LLVM to 19.x branch #103585
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2476101 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • JIT: Add support for SwiftSelf<T> in Swift calling convention #103576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JitDump: RefPosition::getRegisterType() for RegTypeKill segfaults #103573
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add support for `SwiftIndirectResult` in Swift calling convention #103570
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Add support for Sve.ReverseBits() and Sve.Splice() #103567
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • ARM64-SVE: GatherVectorWithByteOffsets #103564
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • JIT: Fix `resolveConflictingDefAndUse` to take kills into account #103562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Clean up `RefPosition` "killed registers" storage #103560
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Avoid check for returns in methods with pinvokes in LSRA #103559
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Accelerate Vector128<long>::op_Multiply on arm64 #103555
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Support environment variables with no value #103551
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created

Merged

  • Move the working BinaryFormatter implementation to a NuGet package #103255
    area-System.Runtime, binary-serialization, 9.0.0
  • match IPv4MappedToIPv6 address in IPv4 networks #103381
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • make the default target lower #103554
    area-GC-coreclr
  • datas bug fixes #103558
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Couple fixes for UseSystemResourceKeys #103463
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Extend MediaTypeNames #103575
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add ILLink option to preserve symbol paths #103295
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Skip IV optimizations when VN is disabled #103580
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [osx][linux] Make sure host symbols are copied to testhost & in-tree runtime pack #103304
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Create ReadOnlySpan marshaller for ManagedToUnmanagedOut scenarios #101095
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Move the thread alloc context off of Thread in CoreCLR #103055
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add missing includes for FreeBSD 14 in pal_networkstatistics.c #103187
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • JIT: Move targets of hot jumps to create fallthrough post-RPO layout #102927
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Extend SearchValues<string> use in Regex to NonBacktracking #103496
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Validate generic constraints in ILLink tests #103452
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • System.Text.Json emits uncompilable code #103565
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Don't run ssl/http stress on release/6.0 and release/7.0 #103572
    area-System.Net.Http
  • mark all BinaryFormatter-related tests as conditional #103471
    needs-area-label, binary-serialization
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono] Fix assembly name parser to accommodate non-ASCII UTF8 strings #103475
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.x
  • fix null check to unblock sdk #103523
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Remove use of alloca from getexepath #103517
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ILCompiler.pkgproj: remove 'runtime.json' when DotNetBuildSourceOnly. #102908
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix DynamicInvokeMethodThunk hash code collisions #103274
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix `SwiftError` variable offset calculation #103043
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2475336 #103348
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Fix the flakiness of new BinaryFormatter tests #103476
    area-System.Resources, binary-serialization, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Make stack size computation in `fgCanFastTailCall` more precise #103538
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Synchronize with PR#103188 to fix the build error. #103390
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64

Updated

  • [Test Only] Force cfg #103215
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Adding CET support #102680
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Convert remaining array FCalls to managed #102739
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • update proxy setting on registry changes #103364
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Make all of the trimmer aware of recursive interfaces #103317
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • event changes for DATAS #103405
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Clone for IncrementalHash and KMAC #103479
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Allow GC on the first instruction of NoGC region (except in prologs/epilogs) #103540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cdac] Implement ISOSDacInterface.GetThreadData #103324
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Windows CNG virtualization-based security #102495
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [cdac] start of Metadata contract; implement GetMethodTableData SOS method #103444
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix 2 issues when triggering a garbage collection via EventPipe #102612
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Expose the useful constant values in TimeSpan #103498
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • Update docs for ByRefLike with generics and add run-time check #103318
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Backport fix for MethodImpl removal when interfaceImpl is removed #103432
    Servicing-consider, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.x
  • Fixing API to use in and ReadOnly as needed #103368
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasi] Implement TODO in mono-threads-wasi.S #101337
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Chained comparison of two integers against a constant is not coalesced #102103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move src/native libraries that are shared between runtime builds to be targets-driven #103184
    EventPipe, area-Infrastructure
  • [QUIC] Add platform guard to `IsSupported` #103342
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [HTTP/3] Support for HTTP/3 multiple connections #101531
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [Android] Allow using installed certificates for client authentication in SslStream #103337
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • [HTTP/3] Wrap Cancelled Request with OCE instead of QuicException #103081
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Support overriding MsQuic.dll in the application directory on Windows. #103351
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Cleanup some handling around Avx10v1 #103241
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Intrinsify typeof(T).GetGenericTypeDefinition() #103528
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Tar: support GNU numeric format. #101172
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Expand host_runtime_contract to get assembly names and resolve their paths #100503
    area-Host
  • JIT: Produce less convoluted IR for boolean `isinst` checks #103391
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • optimize the store/restore for calleeSavedRegs. #101472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Move hardcoded `_BoolPropertiesThatTriggerRelinking` to `wasm-props.json` included in the runtime pack #103422
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/8.0][Apple] Use NSLocale.preferredLanguages on for default locale name #102748
    area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x
  • fix dn_vector_custom_resize #102591
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix handling SECBUFFER_EXTRA with renegotiation after handshake. #103419
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 126.0.6478.61, windows: 126.0.6478.62 #103529
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • CI test #99871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add AbsoluteCompare* APIs #102611
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Pass RID to msbuild task #103508
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-17
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] LLVM version synchronization and verification #2599

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Remove the LLVMSharp dependency #2615
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Don't always build the runtime and fix static graph restore for BuildIntegration.proj #2613
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Don't try to build TFMs that we know we can't build #41639
  • Failed to sign apphost error code 1 #41636
  • When running 'dotnet workload list' in cmd, the categories and their contents are not vertically aligned on JPN OS. #41622

Closed

  • Disappearing MAUI templates and dotnet new install Microsoft.Maui.Templates does not work #40599
    Discussion
  • dotnet run not working in docker container image: mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/sdk:8.0 #39017
  • Strange warning about android version #41444
  • Change Container environment variables to use DOTNET_ prefix #41637
  • [9.0-preview.4] Failed tests not reported to the console in CI on MacOS #41299

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix newline bug when updating exclusion baseline #41640
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • In BrowserScriptMiddleware, dispose GetManifestResourceStream() #41634
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add comments to resources to instruct loc team about 'fixed' portions of the strings #41631
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Adds metadata to JS initializers and JS modules #41629
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41624
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [StaticWebAssets] Always fingerprint initializers #41619
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Run the WinForms app test #40708
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement dotnet test help option #41142
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #41641
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • source-build: bundle NativeAOT libraries with the SDK. #41198
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers: insecure registries: allow https (ignore cert errors), and accept config from envvar. #41506
    untriaged, Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-17
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Add more first-class Span rules #8221
  • Remove warning for `yield return` in `lock` #8220

Merged

  • Queue extensions for LDM #8223
  • Clarify first-class Span speclet #8215

Updated

  • Extract open issues and organize Expressions section #8209
  • Add notes for extensions WG 2024-06-14 #8217

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inheritance margin doesn't work well with screen scaling #74035
    17.12
  • `GeneratorDriver.GetRunResult()` should not throw #74033
    17.11
  • Consider having generators run automatically (when in balanced mode) when a particular SG file is open in the editor. #74031
    17.12
  • Add fixer when for `params` span overloads are used with Expression selected #74030
  • Source Generators referencing nuget packages cannot be debugged in VS #74027
  • Visual Basic double to integer conversion tests stopped working in .NET 9 Preview 5 #74026

Closed

  • Test LanguageServerCleansUpOnUnexpectedJsonRpcDisconnectAsync failed in CI #73977
  • Clicking 'rerun generator' prevent future edits into the regular text buffer. #74032
  • Public API for partial properties #73411
  • Invalid CS0648 for generic partial struct with IEquatable base type redundantly specified in both parts #40538
  • Link in docs/contributing/README.md should work. #74005
  • Overlapped icons in inheritance margin #73615

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix move static members when destination is in the same file #74037
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add LanguageServer.Protocol.Test.Utilities.csproj #74036
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ensure an empty run result doesn't throw when generators are present. #74034
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged
  • Add brokered service for Hot Reload in VS Code: GenericHotReloadAgentManagerService #74029
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Update to .NET 9 Preview 5 #74028
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove warning for `yield return` in `lock` #74024
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async

Merged

  • Fix flaky test: LanguageServerCleansUpOnUnexpectedJsonRpcDisconnectAsync #73997
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Include wrapping options in editorconfig formatting options #73938
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Bump razor to include fix for project serialization #74021
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Check duplicate interfaces only for metadata #73797
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix link in docs #74022
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74025
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #74023
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Needs API Review

Updated

  • Use correct get / set inside ref safety analysis #73842
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Enable end-to-end binding and emit for basic scenarios involving instance extension members. #74012
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Do not treat text as json when passed to api that explicit says it is not #74019
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Support navigating to an interceptor location when on an intercepted method call. #74006
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Expose 5 more things to Razor cohosting #73781
  • Emit extension marker method as public #73994
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Doc Cookbook Auto Interface Implementation #73906
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Ignore user-defined Span conversions #74002
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2475319 #73982
    auto-merge
  • Update LSP Protocol Types #73911
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: plaintext #56274
  • Add support for CancellationToken in AuthorizationHandler or AuthorizationHandlerContext #56272
  • ConfigurationBinder.Get binds empty IDictionary<string, string> as null #56271
  • Generic chat UI like Chainlit or Streamlit for Blazor? #56265
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi should generate references to shared schemas rather then duplicating them #56264
    9.0-preview6
  • Published size regression: todosapipublishaot #56261
  • TypeScript SignalR client (@microsoft/signalr) automatic reconnection sometimes not working #56260

Closed

  • System.NullReferenceException Microsoft.AspNetCore.Routing.Matching.DfaMatcher.<SelectEndpointWithPoliciesAsync> (Intermittent Issue) #56276
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #56254
  • JS interop with event named "close" breaks Blazor 8.0 event handling #56255
  • Reconsider the Platform concept in the new render mode detection API #56047
    9.0-preview6
  • Blazor WebAssembly does not reload dotnet.js after .NET 8 update #56168
  • Can't find the {project}.styles.css file, when using the Blazor Web App template create a .Net 8.0 application #56262
  • Perf regression: plaintext #56253

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump ws from 7.5.9 to 7.5.10 #56275
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • [release/6.0] [release/8.0] Bump to macos-12 build image #56273
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Bump to macos-12 build image #56270
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • Update Swashbuckle.AspNetCore to 6.6.2 #56266
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.6.24316.4 #56267
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 9.0-preview6
  • [Blazor] Rename ComponentPlatform to RendererInfo #56263
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview6
  • Remove redundant check #55945
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview6

Updated

  • Improve Kestrel connection metrics with error reasons #55565
    area-networking
  • Add support for reference-based schemas in OpenAPI document #56175
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Add logging to MVC tests #55592
    area-mvc, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun
  • Quarantine RunAsync_CanFilterHealthChecks #56246
    area-healthchecks
  • Use Convert.ToHexStringLower() #56235
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Use JSON source generator in WebApplicationFactory #55595
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 9.0-preview6
  • Improve performance of UriHelper.GetDisplayUrl #55611
    Perf, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • #54445 ChecksumValidator: Support checksum SHA256 even when the metadata uses Sha256 #54446
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering
  • Add hidden input for easier binding in static edit forms #55989
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
  • QuickGrid: Add EventCallback<TGridItem> for clicking on a row. #55851
